mapper.select:
select * from( select ROWNUM rnum, data.* from( select itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemHitcount, itemDiscount, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage1 ) as itemImage1 from item where TODAYDEAL='오늘의 딜 적용' ) data )
where rnum<=12

select * from( select ROWNUM rnum, data.* from( select itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemHitcount, itemDiscount, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage1 ) as itemImage1 from item ORDER BY itemNum desc ) data )
where rnum<=12

select * from( select ROWNUM rnum, data.* from( select itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemHitcount, itemDiscount, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage1 ) as itemImage1 from item ORDER BY itemhitcount desc ) data )
where rnum<=12
